name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Points & Miles on Google Flights - Smart Redemptions

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Redemptions is a browser extension that displays the miles & points needed for flights searched on Google Flights.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Smart Redemptions: Your Ultimate Flight Reward Companion

Smart Redemptions is a powerful Chrome extension designed for savvy travelers, frequent flyers, and points enthusiasts. This must-have tool revolutionizes your flight search experience on Google Flights by instantly displaying miles and points information for a wide range of airline loyalty programs and their partners.

Key Features:

Comprehensive Miles & Points Display: View redemption rates for multiple loyalty programs directly on Google Flights results, including:

British Airways Executive Club (Avios)
Virgin Atlantic Flying Club
Emirates Skywards
Etihad Guest
Air Canada Aeroplan

- Partner Airline Coverage: Access redemption information for oneworld, SkyTeam, and Star Alliance partners, maximizing your reward options.

- Smart Recommendations: Receive instant advice on whether to use points or cash for your flight, helping you make informed decisions.

- Taxes and Fees Breakdown: See the full cost of your redemption, including taxes and carrier-imposed surcharges.

- Earning Potential: Discover how many points and tier points you'll earn when purchasing flights with cash.

- Peak/Off-Peak Calendar: Easily identify peak and off-peak travel dates to optimize your redemptions.

- Multi-Airline Support: Compatible with 70+ airlines across major alliances and independent carriers.

Whether you're a points collector, a frequent business traveler, or planning your dream vacation, Smart Redemptions is your go-to tool for maximizing the value of your miles and points. Say goodbye to the hassle of cross-referencing multiple websites and award charts â€“ Smart Redemptions brings all the information you need right to your Google Flights search results.

Download Smart Redemptions today and unlock the full potential of your travel rewards!
